revisionDesc.change: Finalized - ready. APPCHANGE. note: in lin1 I cannot READ the abbr for ÎºÎ±á½¶; I could be better persuaded to á¼ˆÏ€Î¿Î»Î»Ï‰Î½Î¯Î¿Ï… <ÎºÎ±á½¶> Î Ï„Î¿Î»ÎµÎ¼Î±Î¯Î¿Ï….
Vote - AcceptText - Accept text. I agree with Josh's remarks and I don't see either (ÎºÎ±á½¶) in line 1. Paul's corrections should be marked as "=SoSOL P. Heilporn" and not "PN P. Heilporn".

Vote - AcceptText - Accept. Some very nice emendations here, with all of which except one (first ÎºÎ±á½¶ in lin1) I agree. Passim: delete /*nothing*/ and just leave blank, display will read "Omitted." Passim corr-->reg. Lin1: I see ÎºÎ±á½¶ very clearly after á½‘Î¹Î¿á¿¦. But after á¼ˆÏ€Î¿Î»Î»Ï‰Î½Î¯Î¿Ï… I see only a curving stroke slanting down and to the right, but not enough to make me think it the iota in ÎºÎ±á½¶; and I suggest that it looks no different from the upsilon in á¼Î¼Î²Î±Î´Î¿á¿¦ Ï€Î®Ï‡Î¹Ï‚ (line3); so, I am inclined not to accept. Lin4,5: yes, I agree in both cases Î»=30 is the more probable reading. Lin14a: accept line and line#; add space after vestig. Lin23: I see this clearly; accept. Lin24: I see Î² clearly (looks more or less identical to Î² below it); I *think* I can see faint traces of Î¹ before it, but that might be an illusion of the digital image; I prefer to defer to Heilporn's reading of the original. Lin25: I think I might be inclined to dot the Î¹ in Î¹Î², but again I am content to trust Heilporn's autopsy. Lin26: accept. Breaks at column tops: accept.
